name: Starts for editors
author: Scott Herbert

sections.description:
This Plugin displays simple site stats in the admin toolbar as opposed to from the main admin menu, this allows all users (all who see the toolbar) to view very simple stats.

the plugin displays the number of page views and number of unique visitors (as determined by the visitors IP address) clicking on the toolbar provides a break down of page views by browser type

If you find this plugin helpful please feel free to donate (to feed me) by Litecoin, Bitcoin or Paypal

LTC LPSbwEknXu3yTZ51xECpSqtw2UJ12nBapo

BTC 19XTvEDSjy39HqxwqXN9bURb5mNBUtZfzQ

Paypal https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=VVUUF2Z82LQR8
sections.installation:
1. Download and unzip the plugin into your WordPress plugins directory (usually /wp-content/plugins/).
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in your WordPress Admin.

or

  1. Install the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in your WordPress Admin.
sections.changelog:
0.3

  • Added limited Google chat support.

0.1

  • Inital version, just had the toolbar information.
